text: Kiya tumharay pass tum say pehlay kay logon ki khabren nahi aaen? Yani qom-e-nooh ki aur aad-o-samood ki aur unn kay baad walon ki jinhen siwaye Allah Taalaa kay aur koi nahi janta unn kay pass unn kay rasool moajzzay laye lekin unhon ney apney hath apney mun mein daba liye aur saaf keh diya kay jo kuch tumhen dey ker bheja gaya hai hum uss kay munkir hain aur jiss cheez ki taraf tum humen bula rahey ho humen to iss mein bara bhari shuba hai
